00048   EUDAQEventBuilder2016::EUDAQEventBuilder2016() : Processor("EUDAQEventBuilder2016")
00049   {
00050     _description = "Processor to built events from raw EUDAQ slcio files";
00051 
00052     registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName",
00053                                "Name of the input collection of EUDAQ raw data",
00054                                _inputColName,
00055                                std::string(""));
00056     
00057     registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionNameTemp",
00058                                "Name of the input temperature collection",
00059                                _inputColNameTemp,
00060                                std::string(""));
00061 
00062     registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionNameBIF",
00063                                "Name of the input BIF collection",
00064                                _inputColNameBIF,
00065                                std::string(""));
00066     
00067     registerProcessorParameter("DetectorType",
00068                                "Name of the Detector",
00069                                _detectorTypeName,
00070                                std::string(""));
00071 
00072     registerProcessorParameter("OutputCollectionNameECAL",
00073                                "Name of the ouput collection of the sorted events for the ECAL ",
00074                                _outputColNameECAL,
00075                                std::string(""));
00076 
00077     registerProcessorParameter("OutputCollectionNameHCAL",
00078                                "Name of the ouput collection of the sorted events for the HCAL ",
00079                                _outputColNameHCAL,
00080                                std::string(""));
00081 
00082     registerProcessorParameter("BIF_offset",
00083                                "BIF Offset between start acquisition and first BXID of the SPIROC",
00084                                _bifoffset,
00085                                (int) 0);
00086     
00087   }
00088

00093     
00094   void EUDAQEventBuilder2016::init() {
00095     temperaturecollection_write = false;
00096     bifcollection_write = false;
00097     LcioEventNr = 0;
00098     discarded_events = 0;
00099     all_events = 0;
00100 
00101     printParameters();
00102   }
00103 
00104 
00105   void EUDAQEventBuilder2016::processEvent(LCEvent* evt){
00106   
00107 
00108     int runNumber = evt->getRunNumber();
00109     int EUDAQEvtNumber = evt->getEventNumber();
00110     int Timestamp = 0;//Event Timestamp
00111     unsigned long long int TimeStamp_start = 0;//BIF Start Timestamp
00112     unsigned long long int TimeStamp_stop = 0;//BIF Stop Timestamp
00113 
00114     int read_0[5];
00115     std::vector<int> read_ADC;
00116     std::vector<int> read_TDC;
00117 
00118     rawData2016 blockData;
00119     std::map<int, int> nHitsPerChipMap;//Map for number of hits per Chips
00120     IntVec nHitsPerChip;//vector to store the number of hits per Chips per event
00121                   
00122     int temp[10];
00123     rawTemp blockTemp;
00124 
00125     std::map< int, std::vector<rawData2016> > rData;        
00126     std::vector<rawTemp>  rTemp;       
00127     std::vector<int>  rBIF;
00128     std::vector< std::vector<int> > new_rBIF;
00129 
00130     temperaturecollection_write = false;
00131 
00132     LCCollection* col = NULL; //data collection
00133     LCCollection* colTemp = NULL; //temp collection
00134     LCCollection* colBIF = NULL; //bif collection
00135  
00136     try
00137       {
00138         //fetch EUDAQ data unsorted collection
00139         col = evt->getCollection( _inputColName );
00140       }
00141     catch(EVENT::DataNotAvailableException &e)
00142       {
00143         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<< "Event " << EUDAQEvtNumber << " missing collection "
00144                             <<_inputColName<<endl<<e.what()<<endl;
00145 
00146         if(evt->getTimeStamp() == -1)
00147           throw SkipEventException(this);
00148         else
00149           return;
00150       }
00151 
00152     const std::vector<std::string> *cnames = evt->getCollectionNames();
00153 
00154     for(unsigned cnamesindex = 0; cnamesindex< cnames->size(); cnamesindex++) {
00155       if(cnames->at(cnamesindex)==_inputColNameTemp) 
00156         temperaturecollection_write = true;
00157     }
00158 
00159     //Get Timestamp from data
00160     string Timestamp_str = col->getParameters().getStringVal("Timestamp");
00161     struct tm tm;
00162     time_t epoch;
00163 
00164     strptime(Timestamp_str.c_str(), "%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S %z", &tm);
00165     epoch = mktime(&tm);
00166 
00167     Timestamp = epoch;
00168 
00169 
00170     //Data Block  -- 
00171     // we add a crosscheck the quality of the data
00172     // comapring the values of the hbit and gain bit stored in the adc and tdc packets
00173     // if the bit values are uncoherent, we do not save the event (all information of all chips in the same BXID)
00174     
00175     for(int ielm = 0; ielm < col->getNumberOfElements(); ielm++)
00176       {
00177 
00178         bool good_data=true;
00179         all_events++;
00180 
00181         LCObject *obj = col->getElementAt(ielm);
00182         EUDAQBlock2016 lBlock(obj);
00183 
00184         read_0[0] = lBlock.GetCycleNr();
00185         read_0[1] = lBlock.GetBunchXID();
00186         read_0[2] = lBlock.GetEvtNr();
00187         read_0[3] = lBlock.GetChipID();
00188         read_0[4] = lBlock.GetNChannels();
00189           
00190         read_TDC = lBlock.GetTDC();
00191         read_ADC = lBlock.GetADC();
00192           
00193         streamlog_out(DEBUG4)  <<"  read SLCIO "<<lBlock.GetEvtNr()<<" "<<lBlock.GetBunchXID()<<endl;//airqui
00194           
00195         blockData.iCycleNr = read_0[0];
00196         blockData.iBxID = read_0[1];
00197         blockData.iEvNr = read_0[2];
00198         blockData.iCpID = read_0[3];
00199         blockData.iNChan = read_0[4];
00200         blockData.iTDC  = read_TDC;
00201         blockData.iADC  = read_ADC;
00202 
00203         // check the quality of the data
00204         if( read_ADC.size() != read_TDC.size() ) {
00205           streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "different size for ADC and TDC "<< std:: endl;
00206           good_data=false;
00207         }
00208 
00209         double adc_v=0, tdc_v=0, hb_adc=-1, hb_tdc=-1, gb_adc=-1, gb_tdc=-1;
00210 
00211         for(unsigned int iRead=0; iRead<read_ADC.size(); iRead++) {
00212 
00213           adc_v=read_ADC[iRead]%4096;// adc, tdc
00214           tdc_v=read_TDC[iRead]%4096;
00215           
00216           hb_adc=(read_ADC[iRead]& 0x1000)?1:0;
00217           hb_tdc=(read_TDC[iRead]& 0x1000)?1:0;
00218           
00219           gb_adc=(read_ADC[iRead]& 0x2000)?1:0;
00220           gb_tdc=(read_TDC[iRead]& 0x2000)?1:0;
00221 
00222           if(adc_v >4096 || tdc_v>4096) {
00223             streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Wrong adc or tdc value: ADC=" <<adc_v<<" TDC="<<tdc_v<<" cycleNr="<<read_0[0] <<std:: endl;
00224             good_data=false;
00225           }
00226           
00227           if(hb_adc != hb_tdc)  {
00228             streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Uncoherent hit bit value: HB_ADC=" <<hb_adc<<" HB_TDC="<<hb_tdc<<" cycleNr="<<read_0[0] <<std:: endl;
00229             good_data=false;
00230           }
00231           
00232           if(gb_adc != gb_tdc)  {
00233             streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Uncoherent gain bit value:  GB_ADC=" <<gb_adc<<" HB_TDC="<<gb_tdc<<" cycleNr="<<read_0[0] <<std:: endl;
00234             good_data=false;
00235           }
00236           
00237           if( hb_adc<0 || hb_adc>1 || gb_adc<0 || gb_adc>1 ) {
00238             streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Wrong bit value (but equal in ADC/TDC):  HB=" <<hb_adc<<" GB="<<gb_adc<<" cycleNr="<<read_0[0] <<std:: endl;
00239             good_data=false;
00240           }
00241         }
00242  
00243         if(good_data==true) rData[read_0[1]].push_back(blockData);
00244         else discarded_events++;
00245       }
00246 
00247     streamlog_out(DEBUG4) <<" rData.size(): "<< rData.size() << endl;   
00248 
00249     //Temperature Block
00250     if(temperaturecollection_write == true)
00251       {
00252         try
00253           {
00254             //fetch EUDAQ temperature data collection
00255             colTemp= evt->getCollection( _inputColNameTemp) ;
00256           }
00257         catch(EVENT::DataNotAvailableException &e)
00258           {
00259             streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Event " << EUDAQEvtNumber << " missing TEMP collection "
00260                                   <<_inputColNameTemp<<endl<<e.what()<<endl;
00261             return;
00262           }
00263 
00264         for(int ielm = 0; ielm < colTemp->getNumberOfElements(); ielm++)
00265           {
00266             //i:LDA;i:port;i:T1;i:T2;i:T3;i:T4;i:T5;i:T6;i:TDIF;i:TPWR
00267             LCObject *obj = colTemp->getElementAt(ielm);
00268             EUDAQTempSensorBlock tBlock(obj);
00269 
00270             temp[0] = tBlock.GetLDANumber();
00271             temp[1] = tBlock.GetPortNumber();
00272             temp[2] = tBlock.GetT1();
00273             temp[3] = tBlock.GetT2();
00274             temp[4] = tBlock.GetT3();
00275             temp[5] = tBlock.GetT4();
00276             temp[6] = tBlock.GetT5();
00277             temp[7] = tBlock.GetT6();
00278             temp[8] = tBlock.GetTDIF();
00279             temp[9] = tBlock.GetTPWR();
00280 
00281         
00282             blockTemp.iLDANumber = temp[0];
00283             blockTemp.iPortNumber = temp[1];
00284             blockTemp.iT1 = temp[2];
00285             blockTemp.iT2 = temp[3];
00286             blockTemp.iT3 = temp[4];
00287             blockTemp.iT4 = temp[5];
00288             blockTemp.iT5 = temp[6];
00289             blockTemp.iT6 = temp[7];
00290             blockTemp.iTDIF = temp[8];
00291             blockTemp.iTPWR = temp[9];
00292 
00293             rTemp.push_back(blockTemp);
00294 
00295             streamlog_out(DEBUG4) <<" temperature - LDA: "<<temp[0] <<" port: "<<temp[1] <<" T1: "<<temp[2]<<"  TPWR: " <<temp[9] << std::endl;
00296           }
00297       }
00298 
00299     //Try fetch BIF Data
00300     try
00301       {
00302         //fetch EUDAQ temperature data collection
00303         colBIF= evt->getCollection(_inputColNameBIF) ;
00304       }
00305     catch(EVENT::DataNotAvailableException &e)
00306       {
00307         streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Event " << EUDAQEvtNumber << " missing BIF collection "
00308                               <<_inputColNameBIF<<endl<<e.what()<<endl;
00309 
00310         if(evt->getTimeStamp() == -1)
00311           throw SkipEventException(this);
00312         else
00313           return;
00314       }
00315 
00316     //BIF Block
00317     for(int ielm = 0; ielm < colBIF->getNumberOfElements(); ielm++)
00318       {
00319         LCGenericObject *obj = dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(colBIF->getElementAt(ielm));
00320 
00321         //Check Start and Stop
00322         unsigned int start_acq = (unsigned int)obj->getIntVal(0);
00323         unsigned int stop_acq = (unsigned int)obj->getIntVal(obj->getNInt() - 4);
00324         
00325         bool skipEvent = false;
00326 
00327         if( ((start_acq)&0xFF000000) != BIF_START_ACQ )
00328           {
00329             streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Problem with the start acquisition of the BIF" << endl;
00330             skipEvent = true;
00331           }
00332         
00333         if( ((stop_acq)&0xFF000000) != BIF_STOP_ACQ )
00334           {
00335             streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Problem with the stop acquisition of the BIF" << endl;
00336             skipEvent = true;
00337           }
00338 
00339         if(skipEvent)
00340           {
00341             streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Skipping event " << EUDAQEvtNumber << " because of missing start/stop acquisition" << endl;
00342             throw SkipEventException(this);
00343           }
00344 
00345         //Get Timestamp start
00346         unsigned int start_TS_low = (unsigned int)obj->getIntVal(2);
00347         unsigned int start_TS_high = (unsigned int)obj->getIntVal(3);
00348         TimeStamp_start = ( (unsigned long long int)start_TS_high<<32 | start_TS_low );
00349         
00350         //Get Timestamp stop
00351         unsigned int stop_TS_low = (unsigned int)obj->getIntVal(obj->getNInt() - 2);
00352         unsigned int stop_TS_high = (unsigned int)obj->getIntVal(obj->getNInt() - 1);
00353         TimeStamp_stop = ( (unsigned long long int)stop_TS_high<<32 | stop_TS_low );
00354 
00355         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " BIF Block - Start Time : " << TimeStamp_start << endl 
00356                              << " - Stop Time : " << TimeStamp_stop << endl 
00357                              << " Acq time : " << TimeStamp_stop - TimeStamp_start << endl;
00358 
00359         //Push values in vector without start and stop
00360         for(int i = 4; i < obj->getNInt() - 4; i++)
00361           {
00362             rBIF.push_back(obj->getIntVal(i));
00363           }
00364 
00365         //Divide original vector in N vector corresponding to N triggers of the BIF each of a size of 4
00366         unsigned int nTrigger = (int)rBIF.size()/4;
00367         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "Number of BIF Trigger in the ROC " << EUDAQEvtNumber 
00368                              << " : " << nTrigger << endl;
00369 
00370         new_rBIF.resize(nTrigger);
00371         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < nTrigger; i++)
00372           {
00373             new_rBIF[i].resize(4);
00374             for(unsigned int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++)
00375               {
00376                 new_rBIF[i][ii] = rBIF.at(4*i + ii);
00377               }
00378           }
00379 
00380         rBIF.clear();
00381       }
00382 
00383     // **********************************************************
00384     //  Processing data
00385     //  build events according to the different BunchXID
00386     //  within one CycleNr, and remove them,
00387     //  until all collected data have been asigned to an event.
00388     //  If TempSensor collection is found, add it to the last event of the readoutcycle.
00389     // **********************************************************
00390 
00391     for(std::map< int, vector<rawData2016> >::iterator it=rData.begin(); it!=rData.end();++it)
00392       { 
00393         //streamlog_out(MESSAGE)<< " ===== EUDAQEventBuilder2016 processing Event "<< LcioEventNr <<"  ======" << endl;
00394 
00395         LCEventImpl* evt_new = new LCEventImpl() ;
00396         LCCollectionVec *colTemp2 = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00397         LCCollectionVec *colBIF2 = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00398         LCCollectionVec *colECAL = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00399         LCCollectionVec *colHCAL = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT ); 
00400 
00401         LcioEventNr++; //Event start from 1.
00402         evt_new->setRunNumber(  runNumber  ) ;
00403         evt_new->setEventNumber( LcioEventNr ) ;
00404         evt_new->setDetectorName( _detectorTypeName);
00405 
00406         LCTime evttime( Timestamp ) ;//
00407         evt_new->setTimeStamp( evttime.timeStamp() ) ;
00408 
00409         //Create new BIF Blocks
00410         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < new_rBIF.size(); i++)
00411           {
00412             int source = -1;
00413             unsigned int TriggerSource = (unsigned int)new_rBIF[i].at(0);
00414 
00415             if( ((TriggerSource)&0xFFF0000) == BIF_1ST_LEMO )
00416               source = 0;
00417             if( ((TriggerSource)&0xFFF0000) == BIF_2ND_LEMO )
00418               source = 1;
00419             if( ((TriggerSource)&0xFFF0000) == BIF_3RD_LEMO )
00420               source = 2;
00421             if( ((TriggerSource)&0xFFF0000) == BIF_4TH_LEMO )
00422               source = 3;
00423             
00424             unsigned int TS_low = (unsigned int)new_rBIF[i].at(2);
00425             unsigned int TS_high = (unsigned int)new_rBIF[i].at(3);
00426             unsigned long long int TimeStamp = ( (unsigned long long int)TS_high<<32 | TS_low );
00427 
00428             //Relative time to start acquisition
00429             unsigned long long int RelativeTime = TimeStamp - TimeStamp_start;
00430             //BXID of the Trigger
00431             int BXID_BIF = (int)(RelativeTime - _bifoffset)/BIF_BINNING;
00432             //Time of the Trigger
00433             float Time_BIF = (float)((RelativeTime - _bifoffset)%BIF_BINNING * BIF_RESOLUTION);
00434 
00435             BIFBlock *bifBlock = new BIFBlock(source, BXID_BIF, Time_BIF);
00436 
00437             if(it->first == BXID_BIF)
00438               colBIF2->addElement(bifBlock);
00439           }
00440 
00441         std::stringstream ss;
00442         ss << TimeStamp_start; 
00443         std::string TimeStamp_start_str = ss.str();
00444         ss.str("");
00445         ss << TimeStamp_stop; 
00446         std::string TimeStamp_stop_str = ss.str();
00447         ss.str("");
00448         
00449         colBIF2->parameters().setValue("DataDescription", "i:InputSource; i:BXID:f:Time");
00450         colBIF2->parameters().setValue("TypeName", "BIFBlock");
00451         colBIF2->parameters().setValue("Start_Acquisition", TimeStamp_start_str);
00452         colBIF2->parameters().setValue("Stop_Acquisition", TimeStamp_stop_str);
00453         evt_new->addCollection(colBIF2, "BIFData");
00454         
00455         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < it->second.size(); i++ )
00456           {
00457             int iCycleNr = it->second.at(i).iCycleNr;
00458             int iBxID = it->second.at(i).iBxID;
00459             int iEvNr = it->second.at(i).iEvNr;
00460             int iCpID = it->second.at(i).iCpID;
00461             int iNChan = it->second.at(i).iNChan;
00462             std::vector<int> iTDC  = it->second.at(i).iTDC;
00463             std::vector<int>  iADC  = it->second.at(i).iADC;
00464 
00465             EUDAQBlock2016 * lBlock = new EUDAQBlock2016(iCycleNr, 
00466                                                          iBxID, 
00467                                                          iEvNr, 
00468                                                          iCpID, 
00469                                                          iNChan,
00470                                                          iTDC[0], iTDC[1], iTDC[2], iTDC[3], iTDC[4], iTDC[5],  iTDC[6], iTDC[7], iTDC[8], iTDC[9], iTDC[10], iTDC[11], iTDC[12],iTDC[13], iTDC[14], iTDC[15], iTDC[16], iTDC[17],
00471                                                          iTDC[18], iTDC[19], iTDC[20], iTDC[21], iTDC[22], iTDC[23],  iTDC[24], iTDC[25], iTDC[26], iTDC[27], iTDC[28], iTDC[29], iTDC[30],iTDC[31], iTDC[32], iTDC[33], iTDC[34], iTDC[35],
00472                                                          iADC[0], iADC[1], iADC[2], iADC[3], iADC[4], iADC[5],  iADC[6], iADC[7], iADC[8], iADC[9], iADC[10], iADC[11], iADC[12],iADC[13], iADC[14], iADC[15], iADC[16], iADC[17],
00473                                                          iADC[18], iADC[19], iADC[20], iADC[21], iADC[22], iADC[23],  iADC[24], iADC[25], iADC[26], iADC[27], iADC[28], iADC[29], iADC[30],iADC[31], iADC[32], iADC[33], iADC[34], iADC[35]
00474                                                          );
00475 
00476 
00477             if(nHitsPerChipMap.count(iCpID) == 0)
00478               nHitsPerChipMap[iCpID] = 0;
00479 
00480             for(int ichn = 0; ichn < iNChan; ichn++)
00481               {
00482                 //Get HitBit
00483                 int HitBit = (iADC[ichn]& 0x1000)?1:0;
00484 
00485                 //HitsPerChips (number of triggered channels)
00486                 if(HitBit == 1)
00487                   nHitsPerChipMap[iCpID]++;
00488               }
00489             
00490 
00491             if (iCpID>=129 && iCpID<=140)
00492               colECAL->addElement( lBlock );
00493             else
00494               colHCAL->addElement( lBlock );        
00495           }
00496 
00497         nHitsPerChip.clear();
00498         for(map<int, int>::iterator it2 = nHitsPerChipMap.begin(); it2 != nHitsPerChipMap.end(); ++it2)
00499           {
00500             if(it2->second != 0)
00501               nHitsPerChip.push_back(it2->first*100+it2->second);
00502           }
00503         nHitsPerChipMap.clear();
00504 
00505         streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"--------------- Writing Event Parameters -------------------" <<endl;
00506         streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"BXID: "<< it->first <<endl;
00507         streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"HitPerChips: "<< nHitsPerChip.size() << endl;
00508 
00509         //add event parameter
00510         evt_new->parameters().setValue("BXID", it->first);
00511         evt_new->parameters().setValues("nHitsPerChip", nHitsPerChip);
00512 
00513         evt_new->addCollection( colECAL, _outputColNameECAL );
00514         evt_new->addCollection( colHCAL, _outputColNameHCAL );
00515 
00516         //if temperature collection is in the readoutcycle, save it in the first built event
00517         if(temperaturecollection_write == true) 
00518           {
00519             for (unsigned int i = 0; i < rTemp.size(); i++ ) 
00520               {      
00521                 EUDAQTempSensorBlock * tBlock = new EUDAQTempSensorBlock(rTemp.at(i).iLDANumber,
00522                                                                          rTemp.at(i).iPortNumber,
00523                                                                          rTemp.at(i).iT1,
00524                                                                          rTemp.at(i).iT2,
00525                                                                          rTemp.at(i).iT3,
00526                                                                          rTemp.at(i).iT4,
00527                                                                          rTemp.at(i).iT5,
00528                                                                          rTemp.at(i).iT6,
00529                                                                          rTemp.at(i).iTDIF,
00530                                                                          rTemp.at(i).iTPWR);
00531                 colTemp2->addElement( tBlock );
00532               }
00533 
00534             evt_new->addCollection( colTemp2, "TemperatureSensor" );
00535             temperaturecollection_write = false;
00536             rTemp.clear();
00537           }
00538 
00539         ProcessorMgr::instance()->processEvent( evt_new ) ;
00540 
00541         // ------------ IMPORTANT ------------- !
00542         // we created the event so we need to delete it ...
00543         delete evt_new ;
00544 
00545       } // loop map key to save the event with each CycleNr.
00546     
00547     new_rBIF.clear();
00548     rData.clear();
00549 
00550     throw SkipEventException(this);
00551 
00552   }// look into collection
00553 
00554   void EUDAQEventBuilder2016::end() {
00555     cout <<" ===== End of EUDAQEventBuilder2016 processor ===== " <<  endl;
00556     cout <<" All events                                                    = " << all_events <<  endl;
00557     cout <<" Number of discarded events (wrong hb/gb) = " << discarded_events <<  endl;
00558 
00559   }
00560

00563     cout <<" ===== Parameters EUDAQEventBuilder2016 processor ===== " <<  endl;
00564     cout << "Intput Collections : " << _inputColName 
00565          << "\t" << _inputColNameTemp
00566          << "\t" << _inputColNameBIF << endl;
00567

00569          << "\t" << _outputColNameHCAL << endl;

00571     cout << "BIF Offset : " << _bifoffset << endl;
